asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
That laidback, beach goddess look begins with your hair. Here’s how you can quickly create perfect, shiny loose waves hair wherever you are. 

How to create Wavy Hair with the Braun Style&Go mini styler: 
Step 1
Separate your hair into 6 sections and braid each of them.
Step 2
Take your Style&Go mini styler and iron the seperate braids. Start all the way at the top, and hold in place for about 10 seconds before letting it cool. 
Step 3
Curl the bottom of each hair braid.
Step 4
Unravel the braiding hair with your fingers to reveal the waves.
